36(1) (Prescribed Notice) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 243 of 2017) is amended— 

(a) 

in the English language version, in the item with the heading 
“Alleged Offence”, by inserting “[electric scooter]*” after 
“[pedal cycle]”, and 

(b) 

in the Irish language version, by substituting for the item with the 
heading “An Cion Líomhnaithe”, the following: 

“An Cion Líomhnaithe 

Líomhnaítear [go ndearna tú cion]* [gur rinneadh cion]* 
(sonraigh an cion, lena n-áirítear an luas agus an crios luais – 
más cion sárú luais atá i gceist) a bhain le tiomáint nó l’úsáid 
[feithicil inneallghluaiste ar a bhfuil an marc aitheantais ……]* 
[rothar cos]* [scútar leictreach]* in áit phoiblí ag …………. (cuir 
isteach an suíomh) ar ……….. (cuir isteach an t-am) ar an 
………. (cuir isteach an dáta). 

*scrios amach mar is cuí.”.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations specify which offences involving the driving or use of 
mechanically propelled vehicles, pedal cycles and electric scooters are fixed 
charge offences for the purposes of section 34 of the Road Traffic Act 2010 (No. 
25 of 2010) and prescribe the amount of the fixed charge for each offence.
